name: Dashboard Workflow Analysis
description: Multi-agent workflow process for dashboard query analysis and theme generation

steps.heading: Query Refinement Agent
steps.content: Processing user query to extract intent, refine language, and identify key requirements for dashboard analysis. Creating refined_query from original query.

steps.heading: Query Generator Agent
steps.content: Generating boolean queries based on refined query, extracting keywords, and applying appropriate filters. Creating keywords list and filters object.

steps.heading: Human-in-the-Loop Verification
steps.content: Waiting for human review and approval of extracted keywords, filters, and boolean queries before proceeding. User can approve or provide feedback.

steps.heading: Data Collector Agent
steps.content: Collecting relevant data based on approved queries and filters, organizing information for analysis. Gathering data_requirements.

steps.heading: Data Analyzer Agent
steps.content: Analyzing collected data, generating themes, insights, and recommendations for dashboard visualization. Creating themes with boolean queries.

steps.heading: Final Processing
steps.content: Synthesizing analysis results, formatting output, and preparing final response with actionable insights.
